# ⚠️ NOTICE: The repo is no longer maintained. 

## Sunshine Conversations Public Postman Collection

For the latest v2 Postman Collection, visit the following link:

[![Run in Postman](https://run.pstmn.io/button.svg)](https://app.getpostman.com/run-collection/0c7cc8fc66039065d20f)

For the latest v1.1 Postman Collection, visit the following link:

[![Run in Postman](https://run.pstmn.io/button.svg)](https://app.getpostman.com/run-collection/c945be79da08ec1bfda2#?env%5BSmooch%20Public%20Env%)


Please follow [this guide](https://docs.smooch.io/guide/postman-collection/) to set up your Postman environment.
